displayName.text: Manhattan Van Hool Bus for Sale

adrFormatAddress: 1955 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: When were looking for used buses for sale last month we thought the job would be hard. The salesperson from Omega made it easy. With a few simple questions he narrowed it down to a couple Van Hool luxury coach buses that they had. We chose the one we liked the best and the sale was complete. We are very satisfied with the entire transaction and we are pleased with our new means of transportation. Thanks Omega.

originalText.text: Our church had a fundraiser to purchase a used luxury bus. We began to search for what we needed and found it difficult. Finally we found Omega bus sales that were very helpful in locating a cheap bus for sale that would be reliable. They gave us a very good price and we are grateful for that. We are very pleased with our new, used coach bus.
